div.p: SPECIAL NOTICE: For our families of currently enrolled students, please refer to emails from school for up to date information.

div.p: We are committed to each child’s academic, physical, and emotional growth to ensure success of the whole child. See what makes Innocademy Allegan Campus the school for your family!

div.class: et_pb_section et_pb_section_4 section section--green et_pb_section_parallax et_pb_with_background et_section_regular

div.p: We’ve formed a partnership with the Outdoor Discovery Center Education Network to help us with student achievement and whole-child student growth that encompasses emotional, social, spiritual, and physical well-being.

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb et_pb_blog_item_0_0 post-2204 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-blog

h2.a: 2020-2021 School Calendar and New IES Director

div.p: Greetings all,Hope this note finds you well!Wanted to share just a few things with you... INNOCADEMY SCHOOL CALENDAR 20-21 Please find, linked, the 2020-2021 school calendar. You will notice that our first day of school will be on Monday, August 3rd. BILL SOULLIERE...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb et_pb_blog_item_0_1 post-2197 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-blog

div.p: Please join us for an Open House scheduled for March 3rd from 3:00 - 4:00 at IAC. The purpose of the Open House is to meet and chat with the new IES Director, Bob Soullier. We want to provide more information, so here is a link to the IES website, as well as some...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb et_pb_blog_item_0_2 post-2075 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-blog

div.p: Open enrollment begins for the 2020-2021 school year on January 30, 2020, and ends on February 14th. If more students enroll than we have seats available, we will hold a public lottery on February 26 at 10:00 a.m. at the Innocademy Zeeland Campus, located at 8485...

div.class: et_pb_section et_pb_section_6 section section--orange et_pb_section_parallax et_pb_with_background et_section_regular

div.p: Want a tour of the school building? Contact us to schedule a tour!

p.small:
For accessibility concerns, please contact Marty Lappe at 269.561.4050
or by email at marty.lappe@innocademy.com.

div.p: Innocademy is a Charter of Lake Superior State University
